Text:
function EP02_14()
    --.承-8【5月第3週】「放課後お茶時間」
    SaveData.Title = "放課後お茶時間"

    --//BG：教室（夕暮れ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",0)

    MSG([[ One afternoon after school. As I was preparing for the next day's lessons in the classroom, the grade chief, Mr. Matsuoka, spoke to me. ]])

    --//BU：モブ女性
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("matsuoka_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mr. Matsuoka】
 "Erika-san, aren't you going to join any club activities?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0268.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah, club activities, right. Sorry about that. As I explained before, due to my family's situation, I have to go home early." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Apparently, Yuriai Private Academy encourages club activities, and I had been asked this kind of question several times. ]])

    MSG([[ Each time, I gave the same explanation, but since PE classes started, the frequency of being encouraged to join sports clubs had increased. ]])

    MSG([[ But I have to attend the boys' division, and honestly, I’m a guy, so I’d feel bad if I ended up taking a regular spot on the team. ]])

    MSG([[ So today as well, I planned with Akira to get through it with the story that I have to help out at my family’s Chinese restaurant. ]])

    MSG([[ However, for some reason today, the persuasion lasted longer than usual... ]])

PLAY_VOICE("matsuoka_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mr. Matsuoka】
 "Don’t give up! Why stop there? Right there! Try a little harder! No, no, no, no! Don’t give up!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0269.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-well... umm..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("matsuoka_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mr. Matsuoka】
 "Are you making excuses? Are you giving up, thinking it’s impossible?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("matsuoka_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mr. Matsuoka】
 "No, no! Don’t give up! You can do it! You can do it! You absolutely can join the club!" ]])

    MSG([[ So passionate. Mr. Matsuoka is way too passionate. He pressed me with an intensity that felt like I might get burned, and I was at a loss for a response. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt it would be wrong not to respond to a teacher who cares so much about me. ]])

    MSG([[ But in reality, continuing club activities is difficult. But, if I push myself, maybe continuing club activities isn’t impossible... ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0270.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Ugh, what should I do?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：ウラン（通常）、モブ女性
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0029.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh, Erika-san. So you were here after all." ]])

    MSG([[ Just then, Uran-san happened to pass by and entered the classroom. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0030.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Today is the tea ceremony club's activity day. Now, please come quickly to the Japanese-style room." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0271.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh, um, well..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Unable to grasp the situation, Uran-san winked at me discreetly, placing her index finger to her lips in a “secret” gesture. ]])

    MSG([[ —She’s trying to help me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0272.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I completely forgot. I’m sorry. I’ll get ready right away." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("matsuoka_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mr. Matsuoka】
 "Oh, so you had already joined the tea ceremony club. Sorry about that." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("matsuoka_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mr. Matsuoka】
 "If you ever want to join the tennis club, just let me know. Burn that passionate blood! Get hotter, yesssssss!!!!!" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Shouting, Mr. Matsuoka ran out of the classroom. ]])

    MSG([[ He really is a passionate and wonderful teacher. Though honestly, with that personality, it’s kind of surprising he teaches English. ]])
    --//BU：ウラン（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0031.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "That was quite the ordeal. But sometimes, saying no to something impossible is kindness too, you know?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0273.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I'm sorry. Thank you for stepping in to help." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0032.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Hehe, I can’t say if I really helped though. From now on, you’ll be accompanying me in hell." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0274.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0033.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Just kidding<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> It’s what they call American George." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0275.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ge-George? Do you mean American joke...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0034.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes, yes! That’s it! Hehe, I’ve always wanted to say that<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t think it was really American, but since she seemed so happy, I decided not to mention it. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Actually, it’s true that there’s a tea ceremony club gathering today. I heard you were a member of the go-home club and wanted to invite you, so I was looking for you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0036.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Will you accompany me?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0276.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Of course, with pleasure. I’ll go anywhere except hell today." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0037.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "How wonderful. Then, I will guide you to the Japanese-style room." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,800,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ Upon hearing my reply, Uran-san smiled happily, took my hand, and headed toward the Japanese-style room. ]])

    --//BG：3F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013bc")
    --//BU：ウラン（ヤンデレ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RYU01oa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    --//SE：肉の当たる音
PLAY_SE("SEa002.wav")
WAIT(300)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0277.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Um, Uran-san... I feel like you’re a little close..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh, why? We're both girls, so there’s nothing to worry about." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0278.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-yeah, that’s true, but..." ]])
    LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//SE：肉の当たる音
PLAY_SE("SEa002.wav")
WAIT(200)
    --//SE：肉の当たる音
PLAY_SE("SEa002.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ Uran-san pulled my arm so close that her chest was pressing against me. ]])

    MSG([[ Her hands were surprisingly small and soft. ]])

    MSG([[ Moreover, her bust was definitely among the top in the academy, exuding feminine charm. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though I grew up with an all-female family and am used to women, her charm made my heart race. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0279.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (U-Uran-san treats me as a friend, but I feel weird inside. That’s terrible of me.) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0280.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Calm... stay calm, me...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I endured this feeling like a monk in training while walking together. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --//BG：和室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG022aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Soon, we arrived at the Japanese-style room. Following Uran-san’s lead, I took off my slippers and entered, only to meet someone unexpected. ]])
    --//BU：リラ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0092.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah, you, why are you here?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0281.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "L-Lira-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Lira-san sat cross-legged on the tatami, looking startled. When she tried to stand up, Uran-san stopped her and gestured for her to sit. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san showed a somewhat displeased expression but sat back down quietly. ]])
    --//BU：リラ（真剣）、ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I wanted to talk with both of you today, so I arranged this gathering. Let’s chat slowly over some tea<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0093.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I’m grateful to Uran-senpai, who has helped me since middle school, but I can’t have tea with a rival." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0094.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "If we start feeling awkward or sympathetic, it kills the vibe. Until the Princess Election ends, I want to compete seriously without getting chummy.<r=ガチ>" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh my. What Lira-san says makes sense." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "But think about it. Is your conviction so weak that it would waver just because you know the other party’s circumstances?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
    LAYER_EFFECT(55,6,10,10,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0095.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Guh. No, that’s not—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Exactly<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> If it’s you, Lira-san, you can surely fight a serious battle knowing everything that’s in the other’s heart." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "So today is a ceasefire. Both Lira-san and Erika-san will have a good time laughing and enjoying delicious tea together." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0096.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "...R-Right. Understood." ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ Uran-san skillfully talked Lira-san into it. ]])

    MSG([[ Though I mostly noticed Uran-san’s gentle side, it seems she can also be quite shrewd, like tricking the teacher earlier to help me. ]])

    MSG([[ Following Uran-san’s lead, I sat beside Lira-san, and the tea party began. ]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    --//CG：お茶会
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM16.wav")
    --//SE：お茶を点てる音
PLAY_SE("SEb001.wav")
--WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ In the quiet Japanese-style room, the sound of Uran-san preparing the matcha echoed. ]])

    MSG([[ I had never experienced such elegant hospitality before. ]])

    MSG([[ I remember my sister taught me a few times, but of course, I don’t understand the proper etiquette. ]])

    MSG([[ My gaze wandered over the hanging scrolls, ink paintings, and the boiling kettle, unsure where to rest it. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0097.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hey, Erika. You’re looking around too much. Eat some sweets and calm down." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0282.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "S-sorry... This kind of setting is new to me, so I’m nervous." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Geez... With a weak mind like a weed, it’s amazing you aim to be a ‘Princess’." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Well, it’s fine. I’ve been through it in middle school, so I’ll lead perfectly with my etiquette." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san proudly puffed out her chest. I don’t know much, so she feels truly reliable. I’ll try to follow her example as much as I can. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)

    --//CG：お茶会（リラ、足が痺れる）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV011ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017" ,1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ugh... my legs..." ]])

    MSG([[ Ah—Lira-san’s expression gradually twisted with discomfort. I wonder what’s wrong. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0283.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "A-are you okay...? Are you feeling sick anywhere?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "H-Huh? I’m fine. It’s not like my legs fell asleep or anything." ]])

    MSG([[ Ah. Her legs were numb. ]])

    MSG([[ Now that I think about it, she was sitting cross-legged from the start. I’m used to sitting like this from martial arts, but sitting formally is tough until you get used to it. ]])

    MSG([[ I’d like to teach her how to avoid numbness, but knowing Lira-san’s pride, she’d probably get angry, so I’ll leave her be. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It’s ready. Lira-san, please take it." ]])
    --//CG：お茶会（リラの前に茶器）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV011ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ With graceful movements, Uran-san placed the tea utensils before Lira-san. ]])

    MSG([[ The rich aroma of matcha drifting over here sent a flutter through my chest. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Well then, after you." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san placed the tea cup near me, looked at me, and bowed. ]])

    MSG([[ Then she pulled it back to her hands, bowed again, and spoke words of thanks to Uran-san. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I humbly receive the tea." ]])

    MSG([[ Her usual tomboyish tone vanished as she gracefully lifted the tea bowl, rotated it twice, and brought it to her lips. ]])

    MSG([[ The moment she sipped the tea, it looked like she briefly frowned, but other than that, her manner was natural. ]])

    MSG([[ She returned the tea bowl to her lap and bowed deeply. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "It is splendid." ]])

    MSG([[ After seeing Lira-san offer the tea bowl to me, Uran-san happily applauded. ]])
    --//CG：お茶会（エリカの前に茶器）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV011ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "As expected of Lira-san. Your etiquette is wonderful." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Well, that’s about it. Oh, can I have more of the tea sweets?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0046.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Of course. Everybody, please bring some more rakugan for Lira-san." ]])

    MSG([[ When Uran-san clapped her hands, a student wearing a haori like Uran-san appeared from the back, carrying a luxurious sweets box. ]])

    MSG([[ The student, likely one of Uran-san’s 'knights,' spread Japanese paper in front of Lira-san and placed one plum blossom-shaped rakugan on the paper. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san took the sweet politely but naturally, without stiffness. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0284.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Such beautiful movements... Lira-san not only cares about fashion but has seriously studied etiquette too.) ]])

    MSG([[ It’s not that I underestimated Lira-san, but honestly, I was surprised. But on second thought, that’s natural. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0285.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (She’s attended Yuriai Private Academy since middle school, so she’s definitely different from an uneducated guy like me.) ]])

    MSG([[ I was again made painfully aware of my own ineptitude. ]])

    MSG([[ Faced with the tea bowl handed from Lira-san, I was frozen, unable to do anything. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0047.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san, you don’t need to worry about the etiquette." ]])

    MSG([[ Perhaps sensing my feelings, Uran-san offered this advice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san, right now, you’re struggling to respond as best you can to my hospitality, right? That feeling is what matters most." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0049.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Not mere formal manners, but the spirit of devotion where you sincerely try to meet the other’s feelings is what we Japanese women have long valued." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Please drink as you feel comfortable, Erika-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0286.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "As I feel comfortable..." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san’s words lightened my heart. ]])

    MSG([[ That’s right. I understand better than anyone how immature I am as a girl. ]])

    MSG([[ Since it’s a no-win situation anyway, I just have to do what I can now. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0287.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I humbly receive the tea." ]])

    MSG([[ Determined, I pulled the tea bowl toward me. ]])

    MSG([[ First, I naturally focused on the design of the tea bowl. I’ll honestly convey my impressions to Uran-san. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "This tea bowl is really beautiful. Was it made by someone famous?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh, I’m glad you like it. It’s actually made by my father as a hobby, bearing the Ryuguuin family crest." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Eh, Uran-san’s father? That’s amazing." ]])

    MSG([[ I observed it closely and rotated the bowl so my lips wouldn’t touch the painted part. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah—could it be? Was this the reason Lira-san rotated the bowl? ]])

    MSG([[ By rotating it like this, you can clearly see the pattern and avoid the parts where others have drunk. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s a sensible custom. ]])

    MSG([[ Moved by realizing the true meaning behind a practice I half-understood, I brought the bowl to my lips and took a sip. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah............" ]])

    MSG([[ The refreshing aroma of matcha wafted softly deep into my nose, and a vivid scene of lush tea fields flashed through my mind. ]])

    MSG([[ I tasted the distinctive bitterness of matcha on my tongue, followed by a gentle sweetness that spread slowly like melting snow. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s indescribable, but while usual matcha is simply "bitter-sweet," this one felt like "deep bitterness followed by gentle sweetness." ]])

    --//CG：お茶会（感動するエリカ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV011ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I didn’t know tea could have such profound flavor... It’s truly delicious, Uran-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Lira-san, you must have been almost moved to tears, right? When I drank it, tea fields spread in my mind... I was really moved." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Eh!? M-Me!? Y-Yeah, I guess I was almost crying... haha." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh my, I’m honored you like it that much. It’s just ordinary tea leaves costing about ten thousand yen per cup." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-What!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
